title: I'm Not Dead: The Journals of Charles Dudley
description: On November 21st, 2015, a fiery storm transforms the landscape of New York City and the lives of its civilians. The island of Manhattan is under martial law. Neighboring boroughs are isolated without power or communication with the outside world.There is CHAOS all around.Charles Dudley, a survivor, writes this intimate and disturbing account about personal demons and deadly encounters with treacherous citizens, predatory humanoids, and extraordinary creatures in this End of Days memoir.(Mature Audience-17+)
author: Artie Cabrera
